posts.title: About ME / 个人信息
posts.text: 🔗点击下载我的简历↓ [站点1：阿里云] 🔗点击下载我的简历↓ [站点2：GitHub] 🔹 本科院校：上海应用技术大学 [ 计算机科学与技术 ] 🔹 目标院校：上海大学 [ 计算机科学与技术 081200 ] 🔹 个人信息：吉林长春 · 共青团员 · 2001年1月出生 🔹 联系方式：13844061985 · Perceive109@163.com 教育背景 / Education 专业成绩：专业前3%[ 主修课程 GPA 3.9/5.0 & 全部课程 GPA 4.2/5.0] 1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: Graduate Planning / 读研规划
posts.text: 🔷 总体目标： 🔹 学习：注重细节、保持思考、阅读文献、勤于总结、勤于交流； 🔹 研究：找问题、勤思考、找方法、掌握专业知识； 🔹 生活：表达、认知、逻辑、执行、锻炼、习惯、规划； 简历 // !/sun Create a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
